Docs.summary: The extension methods and implementation support for concatenating columns together.

Docs.summary: Given a scalar vector, produce a vector of length one.
Docs.returns: The vector column, whose single item has the same value as the input.

Docs.summary: Given a bunch of normalized vectors, concatenate them together into a normalized vector.
Docs.returns: The result of concatenating all input columns together.
